text:
When I try to run httxt2dbm on a txt file it doesn't generate anything (its like the command gets stuck until I hit Ctrl C). It doesn't generate .dir and .pag files. All this happens if I try to generate the files on NAS. If I try the same command on local drive it works just fine. 

Also, If the same DBM files are on NAS and apache is configured to using them, the server starts fine but won't respond and hits high load averages.
creator: nlrreddy@live.com
